Pages.Title: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the latest reported financial year?
Pages.LinkTitle: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the latest reported financial year?

Questions.Label: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the latest reported financial year?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation's total annual turnover was over £75 million for the latest reported financial year

Pages.BodyText:
You can find your organisation's total annual turnover on its:

  • profit and loss statement
  • income and expenditure account
  • statement of financial activities

Pages.Title: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?
Pages.LinkTitle: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?

Questions.Label: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation expects its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover

Pages.BodyText:
We'll check your organisation's financial statements to confirm your answer.

If your answer is incorrect, we may ask you to provider further financial information for your organisation.

Details.Title: Show me an example
Details.Body:
Your organisation's total annual turnover is £80 million and it expects to receive £3 million of funding from the ESFA.

This is less than 5% of its total annual turnover, so the answer is yes.

Pages.Title: Financial evidence
Pages.LinkTitle: Financial evidence

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total annual turnover for the latest reported financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'profit and loss statement', 'income and expenditure account' or 'statement of financial activities'.

Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total annual turnover for the latest reported financial year

Validations.ErrorMessage: The amount must be 10 characters or less

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total current liabilities for the latest reported financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet' under 'creditors: amount falling due within one year'. If your current liabilities include other creditors you must supply a breakdown of these creditors as 'other creditors' is not an acceptable classification.

Validations.Name: Required

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Validations.Name: MaxLength
Validations.ErrorMessage: The amount must be 10 characters or less

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total borrowings for the latest reported financial year
Questions.Hint:
You will need to add up a total of:
  • bank overdraft
  • loans
  • amounts owed to directors - including director loans and director accounts
  • amounts owed to subsidiaries - if your organisation is part of a group
  • amounts due under finance leases or hire purchase contracts
  • additional borrowings not listed above, please refer to the ESFA's financial health policy (opens in a new window or tab) regarding other creditors.

Validations.Name: MaxLength
Validations.ErrorMessage: The amount must be 10 characters or less

Validations.Name: Regex

Pages.BodyText: For negative numbers, use a negative value. For example, '-1000'.

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's profit or loss for the latest reported financial year
Questions.Hint:
Profit or loss is the net amount earned after tax.

If your organisation is a company, you can find this on your organisation's 'profit and loss statement'.

If your organisation is a charity, you can find this under 'net profit' or 'net movement in funds' in your organisation's accounts.

Pages.Title: Has your organisation produced its latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months?
Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation produced its latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation produced its latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has produced full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's latest full financial statements covering the last 12 months
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's latest full financial statements covering the last 12 months
Pages.InfoText: ! WarningFinancial statement uploads must not be abbreviated, filleted or accounts for a micro entity.

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's latest full financial statements covering the last 12 months
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Financial statements must include a:

  • balance sheet - showing the value of everything your organisation owns, owes and is owed on the last day of the financial year
  • profit and loss account - showing your organisation's sales, running costs and profit and loss it made over the financial year
  • detailed notes about the accounts
  • breakdown of creditors, other creditors and borrowings

If applicable, financial statements should be signed and filed with Companies House or the Charity Commission of England and Wales, Scottish Charities Regulator or other regulatory body.

You can upload a maximum of 4 files

Each file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.Title: Has your organisation produced financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months?
Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation produced financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation produced financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has produced financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months

Pages.Title: What you need to upload
Pages.LinkTitle: What you need to upload
Pages.BodyText:
You'll need to upload your organisation's:

  • financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months
  • management accounts covering the remaining period to date

Your management accounts must start from the date your financial statements end.

For example, if your financial statements end on 31 January, your management accounts must start on 1 February.

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months
Pages.InfoText: ! WarningFinancial statement uploads must not be abbreviated, filleted or accounts for a micro entity.

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Financial statements must include a:

  • balance sheet - showing the value of everything your organisation owns, owes and is owed
  • profit and loss account - showing your organisation's sales, running costs and profit or loss it's made
  • detailed notes about the accounts
  • breakdown of creditors, other creditors and borrowings

If applicable, financial statements should be signed and filed with Companies House or the Charity Commission of England and Wales, Scottish Charities Regulator or other regulatory body.

You can upload a maximum of 4 files.

Each file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.Title: What you need to upload
Pages.LinkTitle: What you need to upload
Pages.BodyText: You'll need to upload your organisation's full management accounts for the last 12 months.

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering the remaining period to date
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering the remaining period to date

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering the remaining period to date
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Management accounts must include:

  • a balance sheet - showing the value of everything your organisation owns, owes and is owed to date
  • a cash flow statement
  • profit and loss account - showing your organisation's sales, running costs and profit or loss it's made
  • detailed notes about any assumptions made

Your management accounts must start from the date your financial statements end.

You can upload a maximum of 4 files.

Each file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

Pages.Title: Has your organisation produced full management accounts covering the last 12 months?
Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation produced full management accounts covering the last 12 months?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation produced full management accounts covering the last 12 months?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has produced full management accounts covering the last 12 months

Pages.Title: What you need to upload
Pages.LinkTitle: What you need to upload
Pages.BodyText: You'll need to upload your organisation's full management accounts for the last 12 months.

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's full management accounts for the last 12 months
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's full management accounts for the last 12 months

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's full management accounts for the last 12 months
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Management accounts must include:

  • a balance sheet - showing the value of everything your organisation owns, owes and is owed for the last 12 months
  • a cash flow statement
  • profit and loss account - showing your organisation's sales, running costs and profit or loss it's made
  • detailed notes about any assumptions made

You can upload a maximum of 4 files.

Each must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.Title: What you need to upload
Pages.LinkTitle: What you need to upload
Pages.BodyText:
You'll need to upload your organisation's:

  • management accounts covering at least 3 months within the last 12 months that evidence your organisation has actively traded
  • financial projections covering the remaining period

Management accounts and financial projections must cover a 12-month period in total.

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering at least 3 months within the last 12 months
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering at least 3 months within the last 12 months

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering at least 3 months within the last 12 months
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Management accounts must include:

  • a balance sheet - showing the value of everything your organisation owns, owes and is owed
  • a cash flow statement
  • profit and loss account - showing your organisation's sales, running costs and profit or loss it's made
  • detailed notes about any assumptions made

You can upload a maximum of 4 files.

Each file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's financial projections covering the remaining period
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's financial projections covering the remaining period

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's financial projections covering the remaining period
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Financial projections must include:

  • a balance sheet - showing a forecast of everything your organisation will own, owe and be owed
  • a profit and loss account - showing a forecast of your organisation's sales, running costs and the profit or loss
  • detailed notes about the accounts
  • a breakdown of creditors, other creditors and borrowings

You can upload a maximum of 4 files.

Each file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

Questions.QuestionBodyText: Your accounting period will be between 1 and 23 months.
